synthesis_conditions.general_comments: K3[M(C2O4)3]·nH2O (M = Rh, Cr, and Fe) were prepared according to the literature. [DAMS]I, Mn(NO3)2·nH2O, and ZnSO4·7H2O were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich and used without further purification.

chemicals_used.K3[M(C2O4)3]·nH2O (M = Rh, Fe, Cr): 0.50 mmol dissolved in 20 mL of H2O/CH3OH (1/1)
chemicals_used.Mn(NO3)2·nH2O: 147.8 mg, 0.50 mmol dissolved in CH3OH (2−3 mL)

preparation_phase_alpha_Rh_Fe_Cr.time: 1.5 h of stirring at room temperature
preparation_phase_alpha_Rh_Fe_Cr.yield: large SHG (same order of magnitude of [DAMS][p-toluenesulfonate]) working with an incident wavelength of 1907 nm

chemicals_used.K3[M(C2O4)3]·nH2O (M = Rh, Fe, Cr): 0.50 mmol dissolved in 20 mL of H2O/CH3OH (1/1)
chemicals_used.ZnSO4·7H2O: 146.3 mg, 0.50 mmol dissolved in CH3OH (2−3 mL)

preparation_phase_alpha_star_Rh_Fe_Cr.time: 1.5 h of stirring at room temperature
preparation_phase_alpha_star_Rh_Fe_Cr.yield: large SHG (same order of magnitude of [DAMS][p-toluenesulfonate]) working with an incident wavelength of 1907 nm

synthesis_1-6.procedure: DAMBA was added to the corresponding phase alpha or alpha*, dissolved in H2O. The solution was heated under reflux for 1.5 h and then cooled at room temperature. On standing overnight, the formation of a greenish compound with a metallic luster was observed.
